Scripts.OnShow:
local frame = self:GetParent() frame:SetClampedToScreen( true ) frame:SetMovable(true) frame:EnableMouse(true) frame:RegisterForDrag( "LeftButton" ) frame:SetScript( "OnDragStart", self.StartMoving ) frame:SetScript( "OnDragStop", self.StopMovingOrSizing ) frame:SetUserPlaced( true ) self.Title:SetText(self:GetParent().Title)
for i = 1,5 do frame.unitframes[i]:EnableMouse(false) end
Scripts.OnHide: local frame = self:GetParent() frame:EnableMouse(false) frame:RegisterForDrag( false ) for i = 1,5 do frame.unitframes[i]:EnableMouse(true) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Title = "Unit Frames Panel" self:SetClampedToScreen( true ) self:SetMovable(true) self:EnableMouse(false) self:RegisterForDrag( "LeftButton" ) self:SetScript( "OnDragStart", self.StartMoving ) self:SetScript( "OnDragStop", self.StopMovingOrSizing ) self:SetUserPlaced( true ) self:SetScale( 1.2 )
-- create trait buttons self.unitframes = {} for i = 1,5 do self.unitframes[i] = CreateFrame( "CinematicModel", nil, self, "DiceMasterUnitFrame" ) self.unitframes[i]:SetFrameLevel(1) self.unitframes[i]:SetSize( 153, 182 ) self.unitframes[i]:SetPoint( "CENTER", 280-180*(i-1), 0 ) self.unitframes[i]:Hide() end
